title: 大家问个问题。。！  金锭能干什么啊？
author: jacky9852
txt_content:
如题, 实在不知道金锭有什么用
又不给积分。。。。{:10_495:}

replies.author: GGR
replies.txt_content: 勋章
换勋章

replies.author: 火星使者
replies.txt_content: 如果你的金粒太多了。。。换成金锭吧。。。

replies.author: jacky9852
kehebai
replies.txt_content: 如果没用，给我吧

replies.author: jacky9852
sun丶
replies.txt_content: 买勋章用的
奢侈品收藏专用

replies.author: j20020228
replies.txt_content: 能吃

replies.author: Yaossg
replies.txt_content: [gold_ingot]能送人（回帖奖励）、换勋章（共2个）、还能显摆（别换来换去，收2%的税（1[gold_ingot]换98[grid_gold_nugget],102[grid_gold_nugget]换1[gold_ingot]））

replies.author: jacky9852
HotPe_e
replies.txt_content:
kehebai 发表于 2014-5-6 20:03
如果没用，给我吧
金锭怎么兑换？、、、

replies.author: jacky9852
Yaossg
replies.txt_content:
jacky9852 发表于 2014-5-6 20:15
还有2%的税？！
是的（别乱换啊）102[grid_gold_nugget]才换1[gold_ingot]，可1[gold_ingot]只能换98[grid_gold_nugget]

replies.author: fyq6102427

replies.author: jacky9852
replies.txt_content:
fyq6102427 发表于 2014-5-6 20:20
那积分有什么用？
可以升级啊~！
